title: Server Downtime Status
body: I don't know if I'm gonna get any reply's but i was just wondering if there is an ETA on the server coming back online. I've been waiting for a bit but i just wanna be sure that plenty of time is given to fix the issues, I'm really looking forward to playing Kled :3

replies.body:
The login service has been restored after we put our cavalry hats on and found the login servers hiding in a bush with Skaarl. :P

Let me know if you have any other issues logging in, as I'd be happy to help further. ^.^
